choices: You go to his head to wake him up.
Go to his backside to rest with him.
Take a nap on his massive foot.
144.content:
You slowly open your eyes, your head is pounding. The fact that it's hot out doesn't help. You feel like you've been asleep for years. Maybe you can lift yourself to your feet. You try as hard as you can but your arms give out. Bah, what could happen if I just laid here for a few minutes or hours, you think to yourself.

Then, the rumbling starts. At first, it's practically unnoticeable but it gradually gets louder until it feels like the world will collapse beneath you.
Then, the rocks. As you're lying on the hard cement, rocks of a strange orange color begin to pass by you. Some of them drop from the sky, but other orange boulders roll by, as if pushed by whatever is making the quakes in the ground. Some of the were also strangely wet. The rock smelled oddly sweet like...carrots?

Before you can figure out what is happening, an enormous shadow covers you. You crane your neck to find the source, and let out a gasp.
Bugs Bunny towers over you chewing a carrot. Crumbs fall from his mouth and fall towards you like boulders. Bugs's gigantic foot hangs over you threateningly. You try to stand up and run but your legs don't seem to want to cooperate.

The giant rabbit's foot descends quickly and you have no chance of getting out of the way.

WHAM

You are pressed into the ground by the smelly foot of Bugs Bunny. His fur is drenched in sweat, causing you to stick to his flesh. When Bugs lifts his foot back up, you find yourself being lifter with it. You are stuck between Bugs Bunny's smelly toes and he doesn't even know it. The rabbit continues on his way, while you are stuck to his fur. His sweat drips onto you and you are covered in his rancid stench. You finally find the strength to move and begin to pull yourself upwards.

Almost to the top, you try not to let the odor get to you. Suddenly, you are stopped by a sudden impact. You keep you grip on the sweaty fur of Bugs Bunny's toe and continue the ascent. Finally reaching the top of the massive foot, you peak your head out and see Bugs Bunny resting against a tree. He's fallen asleep and you can't help but want to see him up close.
144.title: What's up, doc?

1443.content:
Standing on top of Bugs Bunny's foot, you took a second and went through all of the things you could do now that the gigantic rabbit was asleep. There were so many thoughts running through your mind that you had to take a second to compose yourself.
You're hot, tired, and covered in not only your own sweat, but also Bugs'. You let out a yawn and think that, after everything you've been through, maybe a nap would be best. Plus, Bugs Bunny's fur is soft and you could easily fall asleep.

It's decided then. You traverse over to one of the expansive toes of the foot of Bugs Bunny. You slowly lie down on your back, feeling the comforting fur surrounding you. It's so quiet, you can hear Bugs Bunny's breathing. Your eyes relax and you slip into dreamland.

How long has it been? That sleep was so good, you wouldn't be surprised if you had slept for months. Yawning loudly, you open your dreary eyes. You were still half asleep but what you saw jolted you awake immediately.

Bugs Bunny was staring down directly at you. Suddenly, the massive bunny tilted his foot forward, causing you to roll down his furry foot. Covered in more sweat, you spill onto the ground in front of the giant foot. Before you could move, a large weight pushed down on your lower body and a wall of white fur covered your view.

Bugs Bunny had pinned you underneath his toe, trapping your entire body from the waist down. You could still move your arms but what good would that do. The foot's odor was overwhelming and you had a constant downpour of Bugs' sweat hitting your head.

You looked back up at the giant bunny keeping you captive. The look on Bugs Bunny's face could only be described as...
1443.title: Footrest

info.brief_description: shrunken down interactive with you being found by looney tune characters
info.description:
alright guys so people have been messaging me to do this and to get back into writing, so i decided to do a looney tunes shrunken story, message me what other shrinking stories you want me to do, so pretty much you know the deal your watching looney tunes one day and the screen flashes white and you black out and land in an open field, looney tune character will walk around and maybe they might find you, up to you grab their attention or be there toy :} lets do this

PLEASE PEOPLE i need people to contribute as well, it helps me alot rather than me posting all of the chapters which i have a feeling i probably already will but just a little help with this would be much appreciated, i hope some people are looking forward to this interactive, as i saw no one has done a shrunken down looney tunes story or not many stuff on them at all, lets get under way shall we

Edit: July 2016: Hey everyone, Hammer Bro here to let you all know that i'm gonna be writing some more chapters and i'm coming back...but first, i would like to thank all the great people that contributed to this story, ya'll know who you are, and Jayguy, thanks for posting the most recent chapter, appreciate it and hope to see more, as i will be continuing this story, the TMNT one and the Korra one, and new ones i make.

For now,peace out ya'll.

btw, if you wanna keep in touch just email me or pm me, or something.
